fields.Title of Presentation: Concrete and  implementable ideas for working with these tools in- and out-of the classroom, as well as facilitating  one-on-one mentorship for more intensive collaborative work, are the goals. As a result of this year  long collaborative effort and via the broad-reaching platform, we will demonstrate how language  instructors can learn about new tools and new ways of implementing these tools from one another, as  well as provide others with any ideas and materials that they have created.
fields.Description/Abstract: Participants received examples for German levels I-IV of ways to get students speaking to each other--from discrete sentences in short dialogues to debates.  Practical application of such activities focuses on the goals  of Communicative Competence: knowing how, when and why to say what to whom.
